[11,4]: Tap the screen in time with the song!
[11,6]: Tap here when the notes hit this area.
[11,20]: For Slider Notes, move the Slider at the bottom along the line!
[11,22]: Moving the Slider changes how the song sounds!
[11,36]: Flick up or down on the turntables at the sides.
[11,52]: Hold down notes with bars like these until they end!
[11,66]: A little extra info on Scratch Notes
[11,68]: The notes in the center move back a little when you hit Scratch Notes!
[11,70]: Don't let these throw off your rhythm!
[11,82]: A little extra info on Hold Notes
[11,84]: The notes in the center stop moving while you're holding a Hold Note!
[11,86]: They'll start moving again when the Hold Notes end, so watch out!
[12,4]: Tap the screen in time with the song!
[12,6]: Tap here when the notes hit this area.
[12,20]: For Scratch Notes, flick up or down on the turntables at the sides.
[12,22]: Be careful! These change how notes in the center move!
[12,36]: For Hold Notes, keep holding down the turntables on the sides, OK?
[12,38]: Don't forget, the notes in the center stop moving during Hold Notes!
[12,52]: For Slider Notes, move the Slider at the bottom along the line!
[12,54]: Flick the Slider in the direction of the arrow!
[12,66]: Try letting go of the Slider!
[12,68]: If Dual tap notes show up while the line is straight...
[12,70]: Let go of the Slider to tap these notes!
[12,82]: Try changing the finger you're using on the Slider!
[12,84]: For some Slider Notes, you might need to switch fingers.
[12,86]: Just let go of the Slider and switch to the finger that's easiest for you!
[13,4]: Tap the screen in time with the song!
[13,6]: Tap here when the notes hit this area.
[13,18]: Next up, Scratch Notes & Hold Notes.
[13,20]: For Scratch Notes, flick up or down on the turntables at the sides.
[13,22]: For Hold Notes, keep holding them down until they end.
[13,36]: Move the Slider at the bottom along the line!
[13,38]: Flick the Slider in the direction of the arrow!
[13,50]: Try letting go of the Slider!
[13,52]: If Dual tap notes show up while the line is straight...
[13,54]: Let go of the Slider to tap these notes!
[13,66]: Slider Notes along a straight line don't need to be moved!
[13,68]: Ignore the Slider Notes here and go for the Long Notes!
[13,70]: Move the Slider when the lines go diagonal!
[13,82]: Try changing the finger you're using on the Slider!
[13,84]: For some Slider Notes, you might need to switch fingers.
[13,86]: Just let go of the Slider and switch to the finger that's easiest for you!
[14,2]: How to get better at Lives
[14,4]: Now that you're all warmed up, here's some advanced techniques!
[14,6]: You can always try another difficulty if you're struggling!
[14,18]: First off, the multi Scratch technique!
[14,20]: Try keeping your finger on the turntable for consecutive Scratch Notes.
[14,34]: Next is the multi Slider flick technique!
[14,36]:
Hold down the Slider and keep moving it 
along the arrows for consecutive Slider flicks.
[14,38]: Just like the beat, you gotta keep it moving!
[14,50]: Here's a technique for when notes stop during Scratches or Long Holds!
[14,52]: Dual tap lines keep the same timing, even if notes stop or move back!
[14,54]: Use Dual tap lines to your advantage when hitting Scratches!
[14,66]: When you try your best, but you don't succeed...
[14,68]: Tweaking the Options can make a world of difference!
[14,70]: Try out the Options that are right for where you are now!
[14,82]: Now you're all set to Groovy Mix to your heart's content!
[14,85]: Play on, playa, in Live mode!
